member.name: T:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings
member.summary: Chunking settings, that is, breaking atoms into quarks.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings.Enable
member.summary: Enable or disable chunking, that is, breaking atoms into quarks.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings.MaximumLength
member.summary: Maximum quark content length. Minimum is 256 and maximum is 16384. Default is 512.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings.ShiftSize
member.summary: Shift size, used to determine overlap amongst neighboring quarks. When set to the same value as the maximum quark content length, no overlap will exist amongst neighboring quarks. When set to a smaller amount than the maximum quark content length, overlap will exist amongst neighboring quarks. This value must be equal to or less than the maximum quark content length.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Chunking settings, that is, breaking atoms into quarks.

member.name: F:DocumentAtom.Core.Enums.MarkdownTableLineTypeEnum.Separator
member.summary: A separator line (contains hyphens and optional colons)

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.DataTableHelper.GetLength(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Calculate DataTable length. This calculation adds the length of column names and row values.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.FileHelper.RecursiveDelete(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.Boolean)
member.param: True to indicate the supplied directory is the root directory.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.HashHelper.MD5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Generate an MD5 hash of a string.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.HashHelper.MD5Hash(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Generate an MD5 hash of a list of strings.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.HashHelper.MD5Hash(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Generate an MD5 hash of a DataTable. This method concatenates column names (separated by a null character) and all cell values (separated by a null character). Any null cells have their value replaced with the string NULL.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.HashHelper.SHA1Hash(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Generate a SHA1 hash of a byte array.

member.summary: Generate a SHA1 hash of a string.

member.summary: Generate a SHA1 hash of a list of strings.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.HashHelper.SHA1Hash(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Generate a SHA1 hash of a DataTable. This method concatenates column names (separated by a null character) and all cell values (separated by a null character). Any null cells have their value replaced with the string NULL.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.HashHelper.SHA256Hash(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Generate a SHA256 hash of a byte array.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.HashHelper.SHA256Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Generate a SHA256 hash of a string.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.HashHelper.SHA256Hash(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Generate a SHA256 hash of a list of strings.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.Helpers.HashHelper.SHA256Hash(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Generate a SHA256 hash of a DataTable. This method concatenates column names (separated by a null character) and all cell values (separated by a null character). Any null cells have their value replaced with the string NULL.

member.summary: Remove binary data from a string.

member.summary: Temporary directory. Default is ./temp/. This directory will be created automatically.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.ProcessorSettingsBase.StreamBufferSize
member.summary: Buffer size to use when reading to or writing from streams. Default is 8192 bytes. Value must be greater than zero.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.ProcessorSettingsBase.Chunking
member.summary: Chunking settings, that is, breaking atoms into smaller, more manageable quarks.
